text:
Last chance to register before the event fills up! :eyes:

Remotish is hosting a FREE webinar on CRM migrations -- if you have a HubSpot migration on the horizon, or a CRM that's connected to so many other things that you're not sure where one stops and another begins, join us on Thursday (8/10) at 12 PM CST so we can help you learn how to strategize for a seamless process!! :smile::raised_hands::chart_with_upwards_trend:

<https://app.getcontrast.io/register/remotish-streamline-your-crm-migration-with-tech-stack-mapping>
